price: Nokorε sε, Yεn na Yɛnyane awufoͻ no, na Yεtwerε deε (adasamma ayε) de ato (wͻn) anim ne (faako a) wͻn anamͻn (anante akͻduru biara), na Yɛasese biribiara wͻ Nwoma pefee no mu.
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُواْ وَءَاثَٰرَهُمۡۚ وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ فِيٓ إِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu nuḥ'yī al-mawtā wanaktubu mā qaddamū waāthārahum wakulla shayin aḥṣaynāhu fī imāmin mubīnin
